short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert text into speech with ease. Choose from multiple voice options and improve accessibility today!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text-to-Speech Converter is a simple yet powerful extension that lets you convert written text into speech. Whether you're looking for accessibility tools, need to proofread documents, or just enjoy listening to text, this extension makes it effortless.

Features include:

Multiple voice options (male and female voices)

Easy-to-use interface

Compatible with all modern websites

Install Text-to-Speech Converter now and enjoy the convenience of listening to text instead of reading it
